name: Spam Wars
description: Welcome to spam wars. This is a game where two sides compete! Grab a friend and start playing... Goal of the game is to click your respective button (keyboard key d for team red and keyboard key k for team blue) the most times before the timer runs out. The side (or team) that clicked the most is the winner! So will you take the challenge with someone? See who clicks the fastest by playing now! Now which side of the two will take over in this spam war?
